description: Specialized in finding and retrieving information from the web. Can perform web searches and read content from specific URLs, including dynamic JavaScript-heavy pages.

tools.name: WebSearchTool
tools.description: Performs a web search for a given query. Input format: { "query": "search terms" }

tools.name: ReadWebpageTool
tools.description: Fetches and extracts textual content from a given URL using a simple fetch mechanism. Best for static pages or direct text/JSON URLs. Input format: { "url": "http://example.com" }

tools.name: AdvancedWebpageReaderTool
tools.description: Fetches and extracts content from a given URL using a full browser (Playwright) to handle dynamic JavaScript-heavy pages. Returns main text content and list of images (src, alt). Use for complex pages or when dynamic content is expected. Input format: { "url": "http://example.com" }

description: Specialized in performing calculations and other specific utility tasks.
